channel.title: Mathematical musings :: Rik's Treehouse
channel.description: Some interesting (to me!) mathematical puzzles and problems I’ve come across.

item.title: Euler's constant: An improved sequence (2014)
item.author: rik.blok@ubc.ca (Rik Blok)
item.description: I found a sequence that converges to Euler’s constant faster than Bernoulli’s formula.

item.title: Shared Gas: A 'Tragedy' of the Commons (2002)
item.author: rik.blok@ubc.ca (Rik Blok)
item.description: My wife and I live in a twenty eight unit condominium which shares the cost of natural gas. At what price level can we expect the residents to switch from heating with gas to heating with electricity?

item.title: Proof of the Pythagoran theorem (1997)
item.author: rik.blok@ubc.ca (Rik Blok)
item.description: I’ve been puzzling over a proof for this for years, and it finally dawned on me. (Eureka!) It’s all in how you draw it…
